Reviews.Title: received on time
Reviews.Author: doug
Reviews.Content: I must say I am happy to receive my products that I'd purchase ,after reading one of the reviews I was a little wary about the purchase ,I wish the seller would of made a comment to ease others on their business practices .. I'm glad I came back and reviewed the items and decided to to deal with this company one on one ,the products is exactly as I expected and will come in handy as we teach our kids in our park to use take up photography .... Look forward to purchasing more products as our program grow .....

Reviews.Title: best camera ever, but accessories cheap...
Reviews.Author: jacoches808
Reviews.Content: This is a really amazing camera.. first let me say that i order this camera two weeks before christmas and they got it delivered to me in 5 days i was super suprise that it came so fast with the christmas right around the corner and the shipping was free. so the box was not damage at all, i open it and saw it neatly pack. so the camera was just super beautiful the battery had some life in it so i turned it on and the screen is amazing it flips out and turns around so it will be great if your taking a picture of your self or videoing your self. "GREAT FOR YOUTUBERS" it doesnot come with a wireless remote which is fine i brought that on its own which is only 2.00. i has a flash in the camera which the pictures on here dont show so the you get an extra flash which looks cheap the card reader read 57 different types of media cards it comes with a 16g card which is small for the high HD pictures and videos. all the lenses are amazing no scratches, the tripod is not sturdy at all when its open and tall but when its small its nice and fit. it also comes with a extra battery which is great while your using one you can charge the other which it also comes with a car charger so when your on the go you can charge your batter which is great. oh and last the bag. The bag is way to small to fit all of these items that you get it only fits two lenses and the camera itself. the side pockets fits the memory cards and batteries, or the cords you get this them a hdmi cord and a rca cord which you can watch on your computer or t.v.... so once again the camera and the 4 lenses are amazing but other accessories are cheap but good for the time being. i took pictures with it and it came out so beautiful, life like.. you must get this camera i gave 4 stars just cause im raiting the whole package (cheap accessories) not just the camera.. ill give the camera 10 stars.. thats how good it is.. oh and the outer of the camera is so tough like rubberdize such an amazing camera..update: they came out with the T4i dont get it, theres a recall on it....

Reviews.Title: best camera ever
Reviews.Author: C. Lewis
Reviews.Content: my wife has owned at least, 10 cameras.. she loves photography and still pics.. this is by far the best camera she has ever owned.. you rarely see us leave the house without this camera in tow.. we have 5 young kids, and she marvels at the opportunity to take pic of them wherever we go..this is thebest camer.. the pics are breath-taking.. would recommend this camera to anyone looking to upgrade their "10 mega pixel.. or 8 mega pixel phone cam".. great cam

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Satyendra
Reviews.Content: Got this for my cousin and its her first SLR ... and she would definitely like it .Also the package is worth with all the lenses, filters bags etc etc.

Reviews.Title: the camera was for my wife.she has grandkids now and it will come in handy.she's learning how to use it.
Reviews.Author: H.L. KARIKA
Reviews.Content: i chose the camera for my wife 'cause it's digital.i'm old school-i like the mechanical cameras that still use film,the canon ae and ae-1 program

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, and great bundle
Reviews.Author: Kabooki2000
Reviews.Content: The camera works perfect and takes truly incredible pictures, and this bundle is awesome, with multiple batteries and chargers, and a great assortment of lenses and filters, and a very nice bag and table and floor tripods.  Use is almost everyday!

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 II IS Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Rechargeable LPE8 Lithium Ion Replacement Battery + External Rapid Quick-Charger with Car Adapater
16GB SDHC Class 10 Secure Digital Memory Card + External Digital Slave SLR Flash
0.45x Wide Angle Lens w/ Carry Pouch and Caps + 2X Telephoto Lens w/ Carry Pounch and Caps
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens & EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens + Wide Angle/Telephoto 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
